description.en: Stripto is the world’s first uniquely designed revolutionary NFT Marketplace that integrates a dynamic pricing protocol powered by the $STRIP token. Stripto offers an innovative mechanism to revolutionize the traditional mechanism of buying and selling NFT products. Users can use $STRIP tokens to buy NFT products at the guaranteed lowest price (compared to the listing price).
